mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "BOARD_TYPE" USING(BOARD_CODE) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
